content.rendered:
Qingdao Bonway Industrial Co., Ltd is main direct company for safeholder tires distributor.

We specializes in manufacturing tractor/trailer & Radial tires, whose annual output at 500 million pcs. Meanwhile we have invested and built a rubber processing plant in Thailand, to process South Asia natural rubber, and mainly supply our own tire factories with stable quality and delivery. As a leading China truck tyre manufacturer, we produce high qualiuty tyres with reasonable prices.

Popular brand patterns: AL910, AL808, AL505, BY967, BS28, AL58A AL97A BY35 AL915 BYT691

For more details, please refer to:http:www.safeholdertire.com
